label: CorrectiveAction
comment: Improvements taken to eliminate causes of non-conformities or other undesirable situations, such as to an organization's processes or products.

datatypeProperties.comment: A type, expressed as text, for this corrective action.
A textual description for the type of transportation waste recovery disposal process.
A code specifying a type of MDH health indication.

referencedBy.comment: A corrective action applicable to this specified inspection result.
